service.name: ABSTUDY Thesis Allowance
service.description: ABSTUDY Thesis Allowance is for students who are undertaking or have completed Masters or Doctorate studies to assist with costs associated with the presentation of a thesis or other similar course requirement, e.g. the costs of printing, publishing and binding the thesis. This allowance is a contribution to the costs of production of the thesis, and does not include costs such as a purchase of computer equipment.
